sentences.en: Forgetting Dia at home, he planned for Hera to elope with him.
sentences.cn: 他忘记了家里的黛.他盘算着要让赫位与他一道私奔.

sentences.en: Gemini might spontaneously elope and then invite family and friendsgather together and celebrate later.
sentences.cn: 多变的双子座很有可能会在大婚前逃逸,晚些时候再邀请亲朋们补办喜宴.

sentences.en: However, Li Xin misunderstands that she will elope with Li L ü.
sentences.cn: 可是, 李信却误会她想与李律一起私奔.

sentences.en: I want to leave the surface of earth, elope to the moon!
sentences.cn: 我要离开地球表面, 私奔到月球!

sentences.en: My parents didn’t approve of the marriage, so we eloped.
sentences.cn: 我父母不赞成这桩婚事，所以我们就私奔了。

sentences.en: Oil heiress Joan is going to elope with bandleader Allen whom she ? s known four days.
sentences.cn: 有趣的冤家喜剧,由詹姆斯.卡格尼和贝特. 戴维斯这对奇妙的组合主演.

sentences.en: She bridled at his suggestion to elope.
sentences.cn: 她很生气他竟然提出要私奔.

sentences.en: Therefore, the two young people chose to elope.
sentences.cn: 于是, 两个年轻人选择了逃婚.

sentences.en: Unless we elope, they'll marry you off sooner or later to somebody else.
sentences.cn: 除非我们逃走, 他们总有一天要你去嫁给别人,可不是么?

sentences.en: Will you elope in the name of love?
sentences.cn: 你会为爱而私奔 吗 ?

trans.tran_cn: 私奔, 潜逃, 出走
trans.tran_en: to leave your home secretly in order to get married
